text.config.culler.title: Culler
Master toggle for the mod. Disabling this turns off all culling features completely.
text.config.culler.option.enableFovCulli: Hides objects outside your field of view. Objects to the sides and behind you won't be rendered.
text.config.culler.option.cullingInGui.t: Continue culling when interfaces are open (inventory, chests). Disabled by default for convenience.
text.config.culler.option.signDistance.t: Maximum rendering distance for signs in blocks. Signs beyond this distance won't be visible.
text.config.culler.option.paintingDistan: Maximum rendering distance for paintings in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.itemFrameDista: Maximum rendering distance for item frames in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.armorStandDist: Maximum rendering distance for armor stands in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.bannerDistance: Maximum rendering distance for banners in blocks.
Maximum rendering distance for chests and other containers in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.beaconDistance: Maximum rendering distance for beacons in blocks. Beacons are visible further than other objects.
text.config.culler.option.lecternDistanc: Maximum rendering distance for lecterns with books in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.campfireDistan: Maximum rendering distance for campfires and soul campfires in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.endCrystalDist: Maximum rendering distance for end crystals in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.shulkerBoxDist: Maximum rendering distance for shulker boxes in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.enchantingTabl: Maximum rendering distance for enchanting tables in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.brewingStandDi: Maximum rendering distance for brewing stands in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.furnaceDistanc: Maximum rendering distance for furnaces, smokers and blast furnaces in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.hopperDistance: Maximum rendering distance for hoppers in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.dispenserDista: Maximum rendering distance for dispensers and droppers in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.jukeboxDistanc: Maximum rendering distance for jukeboxes in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.bellDistance.t: Maximum rendering distance for bells in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.conduitDistanc: Maximum rendering distance for conduits in blocks.
Maximum rendering distance for sculk sensors and sculk shriekers in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.droppedItemDis: Maximum rendering distance for dropped items in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.experienceOrbD: Maximum rendering distance for experience orbs in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.boatDistance.t: Maximum rendering distance for boats in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.minecartDistan: Maximum rendering distance for minecarts in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.tntDistance.to: Maximum rendering distance for TNT blocks in blocks.
Maximum rendering distance for arrows and spectral arrows in blocks.
text.config.culler.option.fovCullAngle.t: Field of view angle for culling in degrees. Objects outside this angle won't be rendered.
text.config.culler.option.cullSigns.tool: Enable culling for signs based on distance and FOV.
Enable culling for paintings based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullItemFrames: Enable culling for item frames based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullArmorStand: Enable culling for armor stands based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullBanners.to: Enable culling for banners based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullChests.too: Enable culling for chests and other containers based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullBeacons.to: Enable culling for beacons based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullLecterns.t: Enable culling for lecterns with books based on distance and FOV.
Enable culling for campfires and soul campfires based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullEndCrystal: Enable culling for end crystals based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullShulkerBox: Enable culling for shulker boxes based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullEnchanting: Enable culling for enchanting tables based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullBrewingSta: Enable culling for brewing stands based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullFurnaces.t: Enable culling for furnaces, smokers and blast furnaces based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullHoppers.to: Enable culling for hoppers based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullDispensers: Enable culling for dispensers and droppers based on distance and FOV.
Enable culling for jukeboxes based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullBells.tool: Enable culling for bells based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullConduits.t: Enable culling for conduits based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullSculkBlock: Enable culling for sculk sensors and sculk shriekers based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullDroppedIte: Enable culling for dropped items based on distance and FOV. Provides significant FPS boost!
text.config.culler.option.cullExperience: Enable culling for experience orbs based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullBoats.tool: Enable culling for boats based on distance and FOV.
Enable culling for minecarts based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullTnt.toolti: Enable culling for TNT blocks based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullArrows.too: Enable culling for arrows and spectral arrows based on distance and FOV.
text.config.culler.option.cullEmptySigns: Empty signs without text are culled at half the normal distance to save performance.
text.config.culler.option.cullSmallItemF: Glow item frames are culled at 75% of the normal distance.
text.config.culler.option.cullEmptyBoats: Empty boats without passengers are culled at 75% of the normal distance.
text.config.culler.option.cullEmptyMinec: Empty minecarts without passengers are culled at 80% of the normal distance.
text.config.culler.option.distanceMultip: Global multiplier for all culling distances. 0.5 = half distance, 2.0 = double distance.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.culler: Culling entity and block entity rendering to boost performance.
